name: Bitter Beets
description:
You are the green little guy at the bottom of the screen. Collect the Beets and Suns; avoid the Skulls!

Finish a level and get a Star by collecting 10 Beets. But be aware! Speed increases every level. Skulls take a life of you. If you have 10 Suns and do not have full health, your 10 Suns automatically are converted to one life. You can use 5 Suns to fire a Sun bomb removing all Skulls from the screen.

Winning the game:

Can you beat level 10? Then, you are really a star! The game runs endlessly, having a changing color level indicator for houndreds of levels. But collecting 10 Stars is considered winning the game.

Keyboard Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrow: Move

W/S or Up/Down Arrow: Fire Sun bomb

F: Fast Forward (if highscore > current completed level + 3)

Esc: Quit Game (only in Standalone Version)

Touch/Mouse Controls:

Tap bottom left/right part of screen: Move

Tap top half of screen: Fire Sun bomb

Hints:

The game saves your last highscore, i.e., your most completed levels. When restarting, you can use the fast forward function, to immediatly get to the level 3 stages below your highscore. You can also trigger fast forward by pressing the keys above or by pressing three times "move left" while your player is in the left corner of the screen.
